column4: oh man this frustrating!!!  I can't do any administrative tasks from from Xfce/Xubuntu, because it keeps saying "Enter your password for administrative tasks"  I give it my root password, which WORKS GREAT by the way inside a terminal using SU or SUDO, but it won't accept it in the GUI
you should give it YOUR password. your users...
cheshireviking, geoaxis, I tried just using my own password, and instead now it returns "failed to run network admin as user root"  so now it doesn't even ask for a password when I try an admin task
